channel.title: Rogue Gnome Identity Provider :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: Objective Difficulty: 2/5 Hike over to Paul in the park for a gnomey authentication puzzle adventure. What malicious firmware image are the gnomes downloading? Paul Beckett mission statement Hey, I’m Paul! I’ve been at Counter Hack since 2024 and loving every minute of it. I’m a pentester who digs into web, API, and mobile apps, and I’m also a fan of Linux.
